readable.title: 319847643_df7c2a1d25
readable.content: A child pushes its face up towards a window of a playground . A girl cringes when drops of water come her way . Girls squints , presses against oval hole in wet , colorful structure . One boy who has a funny expression on his face has his hands up by his head and is looking through a hole . Water is spraying on the child with its face through a cut out hole .
